laboratory_examinations.findings: Excluded numerical and structural chromosomal anomalies.
Showed no causative subchromosomal microdeletion or microduplication.
Excluded a uniparental disomy of chromosome 14.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Sanger sequencing of the FGFR3 gene
Next generation sequencing using TruSight One Sequencing Panel
laboratory_examinations.findings: Found no causative mutation in main Noonan syndrome genes and genes for Costello syndrome.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Sanger sequencing of DNA from the parentsâ€™ blood
laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed both parents were carriers of the HMOX1 mutation.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Analysis of umbilical cord blood from the third fetus
laboratory_examinations.findings: Showed fetal anaemia and erythrocyte fragmentation.
